summary: Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix and it\'s improvement
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10652][b]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/b][/url] Russian version
Author: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3375677][color=yellow][b]SLuckyD[/b][/color][/url]
Translated by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=241997][b]Shadowmann[/b][/url]

Fiks original\'nogo skripta manekenov v2.0
Avtor fiksa - SLuckyD
pomow\' v jetom obnovlenii okazal Daemonjax

***
Avtor al\'ternativnoj versii - Daemonjax
- vkljucheno tri raznyh manery \"povedenija\"
***

[b][color=blue]OPISANIE[/color][/b]
- ispravlen bag \"bluzhdanija\" manekenov
- ispravlen bag dublirovanija predmetov
- ispravlen bag \"ogolenija\"
- teper\' manekeny jekipirujutsja oruzhiem, lukami i kolchanami,
  takzhe oruzhie mozhet byt\' v \"boevom\" polozhenii v rukah
- \"pochinka\" manekenov, kotoryh uzhe \"porazil\" gljuk-dublikator
- manekenu mozhno naznachit\' odnu iz DESJaTI raznyh POZ
- maneken mozhno perekljuchit\' rezhim - \"zhivoj\" ili \"statuja\"
- skript budet rabotat\' s LJuBYM modom, kotoryj ne ispol\'zuet svoj unikal\'nyj skript manekenov

Click for full [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/readmes/Vanilla%20Mannequin%20Script%20Fix%20RUS_readme.txt][b]readme in Russian[/b][/url].

All credits to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3375677][b]SLuckyD[/b][/url]

[b]PS:[/b] [color=green][b]ENDORSE ME[/b][/color] v perevode - podderjite (odobrite) menja :D
author: SLuckyD Shadowmann
